item.name: User
item.description: The User endpoints let you create local or guest users, update a user's user name, and get information about a specific user.

description.content: Get user details
(Required) User ID
Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

item.name: Address
item.description: The Address endpoints let you create, delete, and update addresses, as well as get a list of addresses or address information.

item.name: Auth
item.description: The Auth endpoints let the user log in and change or reset a password. You can also refresh a local user.

description.content: Log in local user with password

Verify password reset token
(Required) Password reset token

The fabric Identity API lets you manage users. You can create and update user names and addresses.  Users can log in to an application and can change or reset their passwords.

Contact Support:
 Email: support@fabric.inc
